DOC.brief_summary: Despite improvements in treatment, a significant part of patients have severe pain following knee arthroplasty. Preoperative identification of high-risk patients would allow for an intensive individualized analgesic treatment pre- and postoperatively and thus potentially in reduced pain acute and chronically.
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Pain After Total Knee Arthroplasty
